message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but $11,000 is a bit high for me. Would you consider $9,000?
I understand you're looking for a better price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $10,500.
I appreciate you working with me, Alice. How about we settle at $9,750?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can do $10,200 for the product. It's the best I can do.
This is a fair offer, Alice, but I'm on a tight budget.  Would you consider $9,900?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $10,500, Bob. That's my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider other options.
